name: can opener
description: A basic can opener for opening cans of food. Nothing fancy, but it works.

itemInteractions.Tin Can: You use the can opener to open the tin can and peel back the lid. It's... brown... and wet. You take a sniff and wince. Fishy, too. It smells like cat food.

verbInteractions.Look at: A basic can opener for opening cans of food. Nothing fancy, but it works.
verbInteractions.Take/Pick up: You take the can opener from a drawer.
verbInteractions.Use: It could open a tin can if you had one.
verbInteractions.Drop/Leave: You put the can opener down.
